localProof.headline: Where to Find Us in San Diego
localProof.directions: We are conveniently located at 2850 El Cajon Blvd, right across from San Diego Zoo and just down the road from Balboa Park. If you are taking I-5 (Santa Fe Freeway), take Exit 17 (Downtown San Diego) and head east on El Cajon Blvd.

stateCompliance.headline: Understanding Title Loan Laws in California
stateCompliance.content: Residents of San Diego benefit from California's strong consumer protection laws enforced by the Department of Financial Protection and Innovation (DFPI).
keyPoints: California caps title loan interest at 30% APR
All lenders must be licensed by DFPI
Lenders must provide clear disclosure of all costs
Verify lender license at dfpi.ca.gov before signing
stateCompliance.regulatoryBody: Department of Financial Protection and Innovation (DFPI)
stateCompliance.disclaimer: This information is for general educational purposes only and may not reflect the most current legal developments. Laws and regulations change frequently. Always consult with a licensed attorney or contact the California DFPI at (866) 275-2677 or visit dfpi.ca.gov for the most accurate and up-to-date information before making any financial decisions.

localReviews.headline: What Our San Diego Customers Say

reviews.name: Jennifer M.
reviews.text: Amazing service at the North Park location! The team near Balboa Park was super helpful and got me approved in under an hour. Very professional and transparent about all the fees.

reviews.name: Carlos R.
reviews.text: Needed quick cash for an emergency flight. Direct Title Loans made it happen same day. The location off El Cajon Blvd was easy to find. Thank you!

reviews.name: Amanda K.
reviews.text: Good experience. The California 30% APR cap makes this more affordable than other states. Staff explained everything clearly. Would recommend to friends in San Diego.

nearbyLocations.headline: Also Serving Nearby Cities
nearbyLocations.intro: Can't make it to our San Diego location? We also serve:

faq.question: Where is your San Diego location?
faq.answer: Our San Diego branch is located at 2850 El Cajon Blvd, Suite 200, right across from the San Diego Zoo. Take I-5 Exit 17 (Downtown San Diego) and head east on El Cajon Blvd.

faq.question: What are your hours in San Diego?
faq.answer: We're open Monday-Friday 9 AM to 6 PM, Saturday 10 AM to 4 PM. We're closed on Sundays. Online applications are accepted 24/7.

faq.question: Do I need an appointment at the San Diego location?
faq.answer: No appointment needed! Walk-ins are welcome at our North Park branch near Balboa Park. However, you can apply online first to speed up the process.

faq.question: What do I need to bring to the San Diego branch?
faq.answer: Bring your vehicle, clear title in your name, valid California driver's license or state ID, and proof of income. We'll handle the rest.

faq.question: How much can I borrow in California?
faq.answer: California title loans start at a minimum of $2,500 and go up based on your vehicle's value. Interest rates are capped at 30% APR by California law.

faq.question: Is Direct Title Loans licensed in California?
faq.answer: Yes, we are licensed by the California Department of Financial Protection and Innovation (DFPI). You can verify our license at dfpi.ca.gov/verify-a-license.
